title: Rebel forces in Tigray claim to have regained control of the embattled Ethiopian region’s capital
content:
1. Rebel forces in Tigray claim to have regained control of the embattled Ethiopian region’s capital  The Washington Post
  2. Ethiopian forces withdraw from Tigray regional capital Mekelle  CNN
  3. Ethiopia gov't and Tigray rebels agree to ceasefire  Al Jazeera English
  4. Ethiopian Forces Retreat in Tigray, and Rebels Enter the Capital  The New York Times
  5. Ethiopia declares Tigray ceasefire as rebels enter regional capital  FRANCE 24 English
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ティグライ地方の反政府勢力が、エチオピアの首都を奪還したと主張している。
提格雷的叛军声称已经重新控制了陷入困境的埃塞俄比亚地区的首都
